links.txt.movieId: movieId is an identifier for movies used by <https://movielens.org>. E.g., the movie Toy Story has the link <https://movielens.org/movies/1>.
links.txt.imdbId: imdbId is an identifier for movies used by <http://www.imdb.com>. E.g., the movie Toy Story has the link <http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0114709/>.
links.txt.tmdbId: tmdbId is an identifier for movies used by <https://www.themoviedb.org>. E.g., the movie Toy Story has the link <https://www.themoviedb.org/movie/862>.

movies.txt.movieId: movieId is an identifier for movies used by <https://movielens.org>. E.g., the movie Toy Story has the link <https://movielens.org/movies/1>.
movies.txt.title: Movie titles are entered manually or imported from <https://www.themoviedb.org/>, and include the year of release in parentheses. Errors and inconsistencies may exist in these titles.
movies.txt.genres: Genres are a pipe-separated list, and are selected from the following: * Action * Adventure * Animation * Children's * Comedy * Crime * Documentary * Drama * Fantasy * Film-Noir * Horror * Musical * Mystery * Romance * Sci-Fi * Thriller * War * Western * (no genres listed)

tags.txt.userId: MovieLens users were selected at random for inclusion. Their ids have been anonymized.
tags.txt.movieId: movieId is an identifier for movies used by <https://movielens.org>. E.g., the movie Toy Story has the link <https://movielens.org/movies/1>.
tags.txt.tag: Tags are user-generated metadata about movies. Each tag is typically a single word or short phrase. The meaning, value, and purpose of a particular tag is determined by each user.
tags.txt.timestamp: Timestamps represent seconds since midnight Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) of January 1, 1970.

ratings.txt.userId: MovieLens users were selected at random for inclusion. Their ids have been anonymized.
ratings.txt.movieId: movieId is an identifier for movies used by <https://movielens.org>. E.g., the movie Toy Story has the link <https://movielens.org/movies/1>.
ratings.txt.rating: Ratings are made on a 5-star scale, with half-star increments (0.5 stars - 5.0 stars).
ratings.txt.timestamp: Timestamps represent seconds since midnight Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) of January 1, 1970.

genome_tags.txt.tagId: The `tagId` values are generated when the data set is exported, so they may vary from version to version of the MovieLens data sets.

genome_scores.txt.movieId: movieId is an identifier for movies used by <https://movielens.org>. E.g., the movie Toy Story has the link <https://movielens.org/movies/1>.
genome_scores.txt.tagId: The `tagId` values are generated when the data set is exported, so they may vary from version to version of the MovieLens data sets.
